name: Avoid classes exceeding maximum length (PHP)
description:
This rule searches all the Classes exceeding the maximum length.
Long Class files are indications that the class may be trying to do too much. Try to break it down, and reduce the size to something manageable.
One class is violating this rule when having more than 1000 lines of code.
output:
"This report lists all the Classes exceeding the maximum length.

This QR provides the following information:
Class full name."
rationale:
If a Class exceeds the maximum length this usually indicates that the class is doing too much and will therefore be difficult to understand and maintain.

One class is violating this rule when having more than 1000 lines of code.
remediation: Modify the source code of the class to reduce its  length.
